1#ifndef OT_GLYF_GLYF_HELPERS_HH
2#define OT_GLYF_GLYF_HELPERS_HH
3
4
5#include "../../hb-open-type.hh"
6#include "../../hb-subset-plan.hh"
7
8#include "loca.hh"
9
10
11namespace OT {
12namespace glyf_impl {
13
14
15template<typename IteratorIn, typename IteratorOut,
16 hb_requires (hb_is_source_of (IteratorIn, unsigned int)),
17 hb_requires (hb_is_sink_of (IteratorOut, unsigned))>
18static void
19_write_loca (IteratorIn&& it, bool short_offsets, IteratorOut&& dest)
20{
21 unsigned right_shift = short_offsets ? 1 : 0;
22 unsigned int offset = 0;
23 dest << 0;
24 + it
25 | hb_map ([=, &offset] (unsigned int padded_size)
26 {
27 offset += padded_size;
28 DEBUG_MSG (SUBSET, nullptr, "loca entry offset %u", offset);
29 return offset >> right_shift;
30 })
31 | hb_sink (dest)
32 ;
33}
34
35static bool
36_add_head_and_set_loca_version (hb_subset_plan_t *plan, bool use_short_loca)
37{
38 hb_blob_t *head_blob = hb_sanitize_context_t ().reference_table<head> (face: plan->source);
39 hb_blob_t *head_prime_blob = hb_blob_copy_writable_or_fail (blob: head_blob);
40 hb_blob_destroy (blob: head_blob);
41
42 if (unlikely (!head_prime_blob))
43 return false;
44
45 head *head_prime = (head *) hb_blob_get_data_writable (blob: head_prime_blob, length: nullptr);
46 head_prime->indexToLocFormat = use_short_loca ? 0 : 1;
47 if (plan->normalized_coords)
48 {
49 head_prime->xMin = plan->head_maxp_info.xMin;
50 head_prime->xMax = plan->head_maxp_info.xMax;
51 head_prime->yMin = plan->head_maxp_info.yMin;
52 head_prime->yMax = plan->head_maxp_info.yMax;
53
54 unsigned orig_flag = head_prime->flags;
55 if (plan->head_maxp_info.allXMinIsLsb)
56 orig_flag |= 1 << 1;
57 else
58 orig_flag &= ~(1 << 1);
59 head_prime->flags = orig_flag;
60 }
61 bool success = plan->add_table (HB_OT_TAG_head, contents: head_prime_blob);
62
63 hb_blob_destroy (blob: head_prime_blob);
64 return success;
65}
66
67template<typename Iterator,
68 hb_requires (hb_is_source_of (Iterator, unsigned int))>
69static bool
70_add_loca_and_head (hb_subset_plan_t * plan, Iterator padded_offsets, bool use_short_loca)
71{
72 unsigned num_offsets = padded_offsets.len () + 1;
73 unsigned entry_size = use_short_loca ? 2 : 4;
74 char *loca_prime_data = (char *) hb_calloc (nmemb: entry_size, size: num_offsets);
75
76 if (unlikely (!loca_prime_data)) return false;
77
78 DEBUG_MSG (SUBSET, nullptr, "loca entry_size %u num_offsets %u size %u",
79 entry_size, num_offsets, entry_size * num_offsets);
80
81 if (use_short_loca)
82 _write_loca (padded_offsets, true, hb_array (array: (HBUINT16 *) loca_prime_data, length: num_offsets));
83 else
84 _write_loca (padded_offsets, false, hb_array (array: (HBUINT32 *) loca_prime_data, length: num_offsets));
85
86 hb_blob_t *loca_blob = hb_blob_create (data: loca_prime_data,
87 length: entry_size * num_offsets,
88 mode: HB_MEMORY_MODE_WRITABLE,
89 user_data: loca_prime_data,
90 hb_free);
91
92 bool result = plan->add_table (HB_OT_TAG_loca, contents: loca_blob)
93 && _add_head_and_set_loca_version (plan, use_short_loca);
94
95 hb_blob_destroy (blob: loca_blob);
96 return result;
97}
98

100} /* namespace glyf_impl */
